item.title: Fragments on Documentation
item.description: A curated collection of impactful quotes and reflections on the role, challenges, and best practices of documentation in software development

item.title: The One About Lehman's Laws of Software Evolution
item.description: In the words of Lehman, “Evolution is an essential property of real-world software” and “As your needs change, your criteria for satisfaction changes”
